meanings.sent1: The breakings of the glass startled everyone.
meanings.sent2: I heard the breakings of the waves against the shore.
meanings.sent3: The breakings of the eggs in the kitchen made for a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The breakings of trust can be hard to mend.
meanings.sent5: The loud breakings echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.sent1: The breakings left a mess on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She examined the breakings of the vase carefully.
meanings.sent3: The breakings of the piñata scattered candies everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The breakings of the mirror brought seven years of bad luck.
meanings.sent5: The breakings were evidence of a struggle in the room.

meanings.definition: The act of breaking a rule or law.
meanings.sent1: His breakings of the school rules led to detention.
meanings.sent2: The breakings of the law have consequences.
meanings.sent3: The breakings of curfew resulted in a stern warning.
meanings.sent4: Her breakings of the speed limit caught the attention of the police.
meanings.sent5: The breakings of regulations caused chaos in the workplace.
